segments.text: My gaze shifts from the sink to the children on the left side of the room.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: There’s a boy, perhaps six or seven, perched precariously on a two-step stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool looks incredibly wobbly; its legs are splayed out awkwardly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He’s reaching into an open cabinet, one hand already in a cookie jar!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: What a daring little rascal, going for the forbidden sweets.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His body is stretched, and the stool is clearly tilting backward.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I really hope he doesn't lose his balance and fall from that height.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His sister, a little girl, is standing below him, eagerly watching.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She has her arm raised, palm open, clearly waiting for her share of the spoils.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're a team, these two, executing their cookie heist.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole situation is quite tense, but also a bit amusing.
segments.speaker: PAR
